results.title: [Management of hyperglycemia in the non-critical hospitalized patients with oral feeding].
results.text_hl: She was on treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 850 mg/bid, @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@glimepiride@@@ 4 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ 16 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 10mg/day and @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@acetylsalicylic acid@@@ 100mg/day.

citations.NLM: Jansen S, Buonaiuto V, Márquez-Gómez I, Gómez-Huelgas R. [Management of hyperglycemia in the non-critical hospitalized patients with oral feeding]. Rev Clin Esp. 2012 Feb;212(2):84-9. PMID: 21798530
